title: Coronavirus update: UK suffers record daily toll for second consecutive day
description: The UK's total death toll from the coronavirus has jumped by 24 per cent in a single day, while Turkemenistan bans its state-controlled media from mentioning the virus at all.
content:
Updated 
April 02, 2020 02:32:50
The UK records its highest daily coronavirus death toll for the second day in a tow, Turkmenistan bans its state-controlled media from mentioning the virus at all, and Indonesia begins its release of up to 30,000 prisoners i… [+3041 chars]
